Monitor Module

Defined in: test/SyncProbeTest.js:41

Core monitor classes

Classes in this module represent baseline monitor functionality. They can be loaded and run in a node.js container as well as within a browser.

This module provides the following classes:

  • Connection
  • ConnectionTest
  • FileProbe
  • FileProbeTest
  • FileSyncProbe
  • InspectProbe
  • InspectTest
  • Log
  • LogProbe
  • LogTest
  • Monitor
  • MonitorTest
  • PollingProbe
  • Probe
  • ProbeTest
  • ProcessProbe
  • ReplProbe
  • Router
  • RouterTest
  • Server
  • ServerTest
  • Stat
  • StatProbe
  • StatTest
  • StreamProbe
  • Sync
  • SyncProbe
  • SyncProbeTest
